name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:**  When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and extension detail are available, record the code with extension detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage. FIGO Stage III is assigned based on tumor extension and/or regional lymph node involvement. Code the following based on a physician's statement.

    200 - FIGO stage III based on tumor extension
    500 - Unknown what FIGO Stage III is based on
    See SEER Regional Nodes when FIGO Stage III based on lymph nodes 

**Note 2:**  FIGO no longer includes in situ tumors.

**Note 3:**  Pelvic wall is defined as muscle, fascia, neurovascular structures, or skeletal portions of the bony pelvis.
footnotes:
\## Considered regional in Historic Stage
\### Considered distant in Historic Stage
\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
